###  Addition

We can get the sum of two numbers using the "+" symbol. An example would be 2+2=4.

```{r}
5 + 6
```

### Subtraction 

To get the difference between two numbers, we should use the "-" symbol. An example would be 2-2=0.

```{r}
5 - 6
```
